chunks.cleaned_english_translation: Theodulf, Bishop of Orleans, speaks on the Holy Spirit. He discusses the views of the ancient Fathers, who believed that the Holy Spirit proceeds from both the Father and the Son.
chunks.original_latin:
THEODULFI AURELIANENSIS EPISCOPI
DE SPIRITU SANCTO. 
Veterum Patrum sententiae, quod a Patre Filioque procedat.
